topic.title: Where is my private key stored while using bit.no.com proxy?
topic.body: I'm wondering how this very update is being done while not running my own node of the network

1_1LNroaTxHDoVxmh4noLEDGMTgUtovmyEAc.body:
> [nofish](#comment_498_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): It's in proxy's memory

Can anyone (server admin or other) hijack my id?

> [nofish](#comment_499_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Yes, the admin able to access your account if he/she wants.

hmmm, interesting. I would post a huge warning about this on every app running on proxy servers. It's a major security issue
